title: validate game page is set to default date
Upgrade to EPG v3 - EPG data only
Player Redesign - Milestones
Games page not refreshed when page is left overnight
Team Based Video list
custom_preconds:
1. Download the App from the Microsoft Store.
2. Login with a valid account.
custom_steps:
1. Launch app with no fav team listed (from updating the app or fresh install).
2. Go to the homepage and scroll down to each video list.
custom_expected:
1. “Your Team's Highlights” carousel → Should show up when you have a favorite team selected regardless if you are logged in or not.
2. “Your Team's Highlights” carousel → Should not show up if you don’t have a favorite team select.
Note: In some cases, you would be logged in (free or paid user) but won’t have a favorite team selected and in that case, you shouldn’t see the “Your Team's Highlights“ carousel.

title: Updated All Star Games 2021 Messages
custom_preconds: This test case is more like a one-off case.
custom_steps:
1. Download the app from the Microsoft AppStore.
2. Fire up the app.
3. Select the All-Star Game.
custom_expected:
Should see the new title and the body:
"title": "2021 All Star Game",
"body": "Eligible MLB.TV subscribers must receive Fox through a participating Pay TV provider to watch the 2021 All-Star Game LIVE in the U.S. Authentication is required. To link your MLB account to a participating pay TV provider, visit mlb.com/asg2021. Live audio and full game archives are available with a valid MLB.TV subscription 90 minutes after the conclusion of the game."

Note: 
Double check this with Spanish message to see if we only need to change the "year".

title: Clips: Hero Content Hide Spoilers
custom_preconds:
1. Download the App from the Microsoft Store.
2. Login with a valid account.
custom_steps:
1. Turn off Hide Spoilers ON in Settings.
2. Navigate to Clips Page.
custom_expected:
1. User should not any content in the Hero that would give away any spoilers.
2. User favorite team background Image or an MLB generic image (if no favorite team is set) in the hero space with ""To view this content, turn Hide Spoilers off".

title: Show favorite team logo on nav bar for unauthenticated users
custom_preconds:
1. Download the App from the Microsoft Store.
2. Don't log into the app.
custom_steps: 1. Set a favorite team.
custom_expected: 1. Get out of the app and re-launch the app and you should still see the logo of your favorite team that you just set it up.

||"title": "2021 All Star Game"
||"body": "Eligible MLB.TV subscribers must receive Fox through a participating Pay TV provider to watch the 2021 All-Star Game LIVE in the U.S. Authentication is required. title: MLBN Hero Spot
custom_preconds:
1. Download the app from the Microsoft Store.
2. Log into the app with valid credentials.
custom_steps:
1. User must be authenticated with MLB.TV creds and MVPD Auth entitlement.
2. User selects the MLB Network option to the main navigation.
3. Click on the landing on the MLB Network page.
4. Click on "Get MLB Network"
5. Verify the text on "Get MLB Network" button
6. Click on Log in to TV Provider
7. Unauthenticated user MLB.TV
8. Log into MVPD and MLB.TV
custom_expected:
1. User should be able to watch the MLB Network.
2. Selecting the MLB Network option should take you to the MLB Network Landing Page. (should see a hero image of the currently live show on MLB Network, show title, and buttons to watch based on entitlement of the user)

--> Authenticated users who are entitled for MVPD and MLB.TV should see the "Watch Live" button in hero spot.
--> Unauthenticated users who are not entitled for MVPD (but logged into MLB.tv) should see two buttons in hero spot. "Get MLB Network" and "Log in to TV Provider"

4. Should displays a modal on the screen with information about how to watch MLB Network.
5. In order to watch MLB Network, eligible subscribers must receive MLB Network through a participating pay TV provider. Authentication and an MLB.TV account is required. To find out which pay TV providers carry MLB Network in your area, visit https://www.mlb.com/network/get-mlb-network 
6. Should bring the user to the MLBN paywall page.
7. The user sees a message that says “MLB Network requires a MLB.tv account and a pay TV subscription”
8. User should see the MLB Network landing page with entitled state and the "Watch Live" button

title: MLBN Paywall message
custom_preconds:
1. Download the app from the respective app store.
2. Log in to the app with valid credentials.
custom_steps: 1. Authenticate via MVPD, come back to the app, and click Done.
custom_expected:
The app will re-check entitlements:

if Entitled, go back to the MLB Network landing page. The hero will refresh and will now show the “Watch Live” button.

if not entitled, show error message: “Account not yet linked to pay TV provider. Please try again.“  After  OK out of this error dialog, direct users back to MLB Network landing page with the two buttons.

title: MLBN EPG Carousel see the upcoming schedule of shows
custom_preconds:
1. Download the app from the app store.
2. Log in to the app with valid credentials.
custom_steps:
1. Log into the app.
2. Scroll below the hero.
3. Expand the Carousel.
4. Check cache EPG data in fiddler
5. Check the hero.
6. MLBN check for auto re-render when the next program is up
custom_expected:
1. Should see a hero and carousels matching the user experience of the Welcome Center.
2. and the Carousel should contain the upcoming program schedule for MLB Network shows. Carousel items contain:
Image, Show name, Show time, Blurb.
Blurb displays when the carousel is highlighted by cursor/remote (carousel expands when highlighted to show blurb).
 
3. Carousel should fit the screen and does not scroll up.
4. Cache EPG data should NOT be more than 15 minutes. MAXIMUM 15 minutes
5. The First program should be in the hero spot. Rest of the programs in Carousel.
6. The first program in the carousel moves to hero and the second program shifts into the first position.

title: MLBN Video Playback seamless experience
custom_preconds:
1. Download the app from the app store.
2. Log in to the app with valid credentials.
custom_steps:
1. Select the "Watch Live" button in the hero.
2. Click the available stream
3. Click on CC Option
4. On-screen validation
5. Click the back button on the controller
custom_expected:
1. Should see the MLB Network playback page with the live linear MLB network streaming options for authenticated users.
2. The live stream does not support rewind, pause, scrubbing, or archives.
3. User should be able to see the closed captioning above the scrubber (if the close captioning is available).
4. User should see LIVE on the scrubber and should not see any other video controls on the scrubber.
5. Should return back to the MLB Network page where they came from.

title: Pre/Post Feed Picker
custom_preconds:
1. Download the app from the Microsoft Store.
2. Log into the app with valid credentials.
custom_steps:
1. User go to Home or Games page and select a Game tile.
2. User selects a feed picker.
custom_expected:
1. User should see that Game tile should pop open on the screen.
2. User should see the Pre/Post game show labels on top of the feed picker. (ONLY when game is Live).
3. When the game is live, these labels (pre/post) should not appear.
4. User should expect to see Prefix on the feed button label.
See Zeplin doc for reference. --> https://app.zeplin.io/project/602d8b2f551d2c235b342753/screen/60b68f0b5b4ba77b8641cc39

NOTE: You might have to reinstall the app and create a new account because you cannot unselect a favorite team once it's selected.
custom_expected: 1. User should expect to see the Watch Live button and upon clicking the button user should see the Live game that has Pre/Post show.

title: Pre/Post Feature --> Both teams have pre/post-show

custom_expected: 1. User should expect to see a normal featured game.
